body: Honestly, this is the hottest chapter imo. They both finally know and agree they want each other. And have hot sex behind the mom's back.

What in the-
Really? The characters in the video, wow this is some really meta stuff huh.

I guess this ties back to that part of "10-sai" where Amae thinks to herself that the father and daughter in the video she's watching look just like her own father and herself (ie: the characters here were the characters in the video).
Really hope someone will pick up and TL the rest of the series
